name: Shield or Die !
description:
Hi guyz bro, im a new game dev and i really want to do that full time.. 

I need to start somewhere.. Oh.. this is my first game, i hope you like it. 

ESC = Quit Game

P = Pause

M = Mute Music

WASD = Movement

Mouse = Shield 

ENJOY

KNOWN BUGS ;

-Double shield;  Fixed but this looks better, so its  available :3

-Shield climbing;  

-Double bgm;

-Arrows not spawning;

Worms Flying 

ALL YOU HAVE TO DO, STAY ALIVE TILL THE EXIT

^ OLD VERSION ^
